text: Alessandro Favalli (born 15 November 1992) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a defender for Serie C club Reggiana. He is the son of former Lazio, Milan and Italy player Giuseppe Favalli. Favalli was born in Cremona. He played four games for the Italy under-20 team in 2011–12. Since 2010, he has played for a number of clubs including Cremonese, Cesena, Parma, Gorica, Padova, Ternana and Catanzaro. In 2020, he joined Reggiana. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Favalli had tested positive to COVID-19. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Lombardy Category:Sportspeople from Cremona
title: Alessandro Favalli
